comments:
BtM's Getting Started document does not include information on configuring the IAC.

The BtM Getting Started document (http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/monitoring/documents/tutorials/tptp_btm_setup.html) does not include the necessary information to configure the IAC.  As such, when the user attempts to instrument an application with the IAC, the user receives the following error:

org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
RAC is not started, the process will exit

org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: RAC is not started, the process will exit
  at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.instrumentation.ui.internal.launcher.deleg.application.InstrumentDelegateHelper.preLaunch(InstrumentDelegateHelper.java:84)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.platform.instrumentation.ui.internal.launcher.deleg.application.InstrumentJavaLauncherDelegate.preLaunch(InstrumentJavaLauncherDelegate.java:55)
  at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.provisional.launcher.PrimaryLaunchDelegate.run(PrimaryLaunchDelegate.java:244)
  at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:788)
Added section 1.5.2 Configuring Integrated Agent Controller (IAC) for IAC support.

traces.message: RAC is not started, the process will exit
